cast.name: 格拉谢拉·博尔赫斯 Graciela Borges

introduction: 本片于05年完成后被禁了2年才得以公映.A photographer in Argentina documents the construction of a bridge that connects Victoria and Rosario. The job will change his life and touch the lives of others. "There are moments when I feel like stepping into each of their stories," says the photographer hired to document construction of a bridge that will connect Victoria with Rosario -- two cities on opposite sides of the Paraná River in Argentina. But that is a different movie, he sighs, unaware that his own story will be changed by the lives he touches with his camera. Building the bridge takes years, transforming lives on both sides of the river. Two carefree boys grow into teenagers on the river, as the bridge takes shape; a mysterious engineer touches the lives of the elderly sisters who rent him a room. The photographer's pictures document the process of change, but even he is unprepared for the transformation that only begins when the bridge is complete.
